text: HPV vaccine can target a wide age range and there are several delivery strategies that can be used including school-, community- and health facility-based delivery.In addition, HPV vaccine doses administered in special settings, such as factories, hospitals and in the private sector, may not be routinely captured in the national immunization coverage data.
